_header: If a thought come to thine heart
_description: Be well advised before acting or speaking — one quatrain

CamMagPep2125.Transcription:
If a thought come to thyn herteto do or seye in ony degreBe nat
                    to hastyf lest þu smerteTil þu riȝt wel avised be
